AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: specimen disassembler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is practiced in the handling of biomaterialsattendants are tasked with the en suite staging of bio-asset's, preliminary examinations, basic imaging procedures, and non-critical tissue extraction.
